title: Fallen Angel Directives
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Hey, don’t you think this part could use a more mysterious feeling to it? This Yohane appears here, after all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Let’s see.... Taking your character into consideration, it might just work, Yoshiko-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmm, then let’s change the lighting. And maybe add smoke and other stuff! What do you think, Yoshiko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You two.... It’s Yohane, okay!? Also, it’s not a character! ....Ahem, putting that aside, adding smoke is a good idea. We can have me come out from it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>How about we also scatter some black feathers from the top? They were selling them in bulk at a store I went to the other day.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Oooh! That sounds interesting! It would be okay, right, Yoshiko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>As I said, it’s Yohane! The black feather is a good idea too. Let’s go buy them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ah, umm, there’s also a taiyaki place near that store. So if you want to, we could....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eeeh, really!? Let’s go, let’s go! I wonder if they’ll have cream cheese taiyaki~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I’ll get a chocolate one! What about you, Shioriko?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I-, I’ll go with red bean paste! Fufu, I’m looking forward to shopping even more now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
